name: Arcadia (itch) (MrTopFish)
description:
The game introduces a very linear gameplay the player will need to adventure through the game by

solving or fighting through each level to complete the game. The game will provide difficult task for

the player to conquer through such as bosses and puzzle which the player will need to complete to

finish the game. It will also provide small additional task for the player to perform such as to collect

ammos and score, these will help to progress the character further into the game and will force

player to collect such items to progress ahead.
